Class Projectile

java.lang.Object
Actor
Projectile
Direct Known Subclasses:
Asteroid
public class Projectile
extends Actor
A projectile class that moves and deals damage when overlapping another actor. Starts with an initial velocity.

  • Constructor Details

    • Projectile

      public Projectile​(int x, int y, int r, javax.swing.ImageIcon i, int xv, int yv, float dmg, boolean bShouldDieOnHit, Actor caster)
      Constructor for a projectile
      Parameters:
      x - the starting x-location of the projectile
      y - the starting y-location of the projectile
      r - the radius of the projectile's hitbox.
      i - the image to represent the projectile on screen
      xv - the x-velocity of the projectile
      yv - the y-velocity of the projectile
      dmg - the amount of damage dealt by this projectile
      bShouldDieOnHit - whether or not the projectile deletes itself from the game after colliding with another actor
      caster - the character that created this projectile (null if the projectile spawned by itself into the game)

      Whether or not this actor is intersecting any other actors

      Returns:
      whether or not this actor and the other actor are intersecting

      Constructs a projectile
